parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Brake Rotor Warping and Wear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake rotor warping and wear can lead to reduced braking performance, increased stopping distances, and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: Brake rotors warp and wear prematurely
brake pads wear out quickly
brake pedal pulsation or vibration
uneven brake rotor wear
brake noise or grinding sounds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden loss of braking power
brake pedal goes to the floor
brake warning lights illuminate
unusual brake noise or sounds
brake fluid leaks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration and brake failure can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, damage to property, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly
the brakes fail to respond or are ineffective
the vehicle surges forward or backward
the vehicle is difficult to control or steer
the vehicle crashes or collides with objects.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Power Window Failure due to Faulty Window Regulator and Glass Runs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window system can cause the window to fall out of the door, potentially leading to accidents or injuries, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The window falls out of the door while driving
the window regulator fails
the glass runs break
the door opens unexpectedly while driving
the window does not stay in place.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Opening Uncontrollably due to Power Window Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window system can cause the door to open unexpectedly while driving, which can lead to accidents or injuries, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The door opens unexpectedly while driving
the window falls out of the door while driving
the window regulator fails
the glass runs break
the vehicle is difficult to control.
